channel.title: Compiler issues please help
channel.description:
Compiler code [code=actionscript]@echo off echo Compiling "C:\Program Files\Java\java1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\java1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java echo Complete pause[/code]
Error: [code=html4strict]Compiling The system could not find the path specified The system could not find the path specified Complete Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
My java is 7_9
Skype: xDetrick [Online]

item.title: Compiler issues please help
item.dc:creator: @MoralMerk MoralMerk
item.description:
@MoralMerk wrote:

Make sure your JDK is the one in the compiler/run.bats and also you may need to setup your environmental variables if you have not yet done so.
